>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1beta/secrets/default/keys/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete a secret from the default provider (encrypted provider only)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Secret key","in":"path","name":"key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"No Content"},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Not Found - Provider not setup or secret not found"},"405":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Method Not Allowed - Provider doesn't support deletion"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
